name: SaturdayNightVania
description:
Oh what a night!

Tony DaHero, is just out to have a good time, but he's in for a complete Disco balls up

W(jump)  

A (crouch) 

SD to move left right

Space to attack

Arrow keys to switch ability

Gamepad supported joystick to move B to fire

All Grpahics by TPD, sound and Music by Ominous Pigeon Master 

Note engine is pretty heavy, may run poorly on lower spec'd machines, especially the web version
